name: OWN - On the Way to Nemroth
summary:
OWN is a browser-based game in which players fight each other in 1v1, 2v2 and 3v3 death matches. The heroes have small skillsets, like in MOBAs, and fight agressively on small maps, like in Brawlers. 
 
The game emphasizes the competitive aspect with leagues, high-depth heroes and no random mechanics, but you can play casually as well in normal or private games. 
 
OWN is 100% free-to-play and contains no ad (it is pay-to-customize). You can loot chests and win virtual currency as well, with which you can buy all purchasable content. 
 
You can access the game at https://www.nemroth.com ! And earn a free legendary chest at registration!
storyline: Two races, the Telegohns and the Krons, fight each other after the fall of the great wall. After millenias of ignoring each other's existence, they wage war against one another recklessly. Either play the Telegohns and make the most of their ability to master space, or the Krons, who master time!
